translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
Ekankar, the Lors second to none, created gurmukh (to liberate the world).
That Oankar assuming forms has become manifest.
By extension (and combination) of the five elements this world has been created.
The four mines of life and four speeches ( para, pasyanti, madhyama, vaikhari) have been generated.

gurmukhi: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kudarati Agam Apaaru Antu N Paaiaa.
translation: His feats of amusements are inaccessible and limitless; their extremes are unattainable.
The name of that creator is Truth and He is ever immersed in Truth.
The best among the eightyfour lakhs of species of life
Souls wander fruitlessly in the eighty-four lakhs of species of life.
The rare human body has been obtained owing to virtuous actions.
Moving on greatest path of the Guru orientated, the self has lost the ego.
Maintaining the discipline of the holy congregation has come to fall at the feet (of the Guru).
Gurmukhs have adopted the name of the Lord, the charity, the ablution and truthful conduct steadfastly.

transliteration: Sabadu Surati Liv Leenu Bhaanaa Bhaaiaa ?2?
translation: The man has merged his consciousness in the Word and has accepted the will of the Lord.
Gurmukh is the guest ,
Gurmukh taught by the Guru is well trained and knowledgeable.
He understands that he has come to the assembly of this world as a guest.
He eats and drinks what is bestowed by the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਕਰੈ ਨ ਗਰਬੁ ਗੁਮਾਣੁ ਹਸੈ ਹਸਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Karai N Garabu Goumaanu Hasai Hasaaiaa.
translation: Gurmukh is not arrogant and feels happy in the happiness given by the Lord.
Only that guest gets accepted in the court of the Lord who has lived here as a good guest.
He moves from here silently and makes the whole assembly wonders struck (because others feel very difficult to leave this world).
Method of moving around ,
Gurmukh knows this world as a place of rest for a few days.
Here with the help of wealth many types of sports and feats are enacted.
In this very world, for gurmukhs incessant rain of nectar goes on pouring.
On the tune of flute (the unstruck melody) they go on enjoying the delight of the assembly.
Well-trained and knowledgeable persons sing Majh and Malhar musical measures here i.e. they enjoy the present.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਮਨਿ ਵਸਿ ਅਾਣੀਅੈ
transliteration: Haoumai Garabu Nivaari Mani Vasi Aaneeai.
translation: They lose their ego and control their minds.
Contemplating the Word, the Gurmukh identifies the truth.
Moving teachnique - living an inn ,
A wayfarer, on the way halted in an inn.
Then moved forward on the told path.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਹਿ ਪਰਾੲੀ ਤਾਤਿ ਨ ਚਿਤਿ ਰਹਸਿਅਾ
transliteration: Naahi Paraaee Taati N Chiti Rahasiaa.
translation: He neither got envious with anyone nor did he get infatuated by any.

gurmukhi: ਮੁੲੇ ਨ ਪੁਛੈ ਜਾਤਿ ਵਿਵਾਹਿ ਨ ਹਸਿਅਾ
transliteration: Muay N Pouchhai Jaati Vivaahi N Hasiaa.
translation: He neither asked the caste (identity) of any dying person nor he felt any delight witnessing the marriage ceremonies etc.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਤਾ ਕਰੈ ਜੁ ਦਾਤਿ ਨ ਭੁਖਾ ਤਸਿਅਾ
transliteration: Daataa Karay Ju Daati N Bhoukhaa Tasiaa.
translation: He happily accepted gifts of the Lord and never remained hungry or thirsty.
The lotus face of the gurmukh always remains in blossom due to continuous remembrance of the Lord.
Moving teachnique - living an inn
Lamps are lighted in the night of divali festival;
Stars of different variety appear in the sky;

gurmukhi: ਫੁਲਾਂ ਦੀ ਬਾਗਾਤਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਚਾਲੀਅਨਿ
transliteration: Phulaan Dee Baagaati Chouni Chouni Chaaleeani.
translation: In the gardens the flowers are there which are selectively plucked;
The pilgrims going to pilgrimage centres are also seen.
The imaginary habitats have been seen coming into being and vanishing.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਦਾਤਿ ਸਬਦਿ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲੀਅਨਿ ||੬||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Daati Sabadi Samhaaleeani ?6?
translation: All these are momentary, but the gurmukhs with the help of the Word nourish the gift of the pleasure fruit.
Way of the world - parent's home -
The gurmukh who have received well with the Guru's teachings have got their minds enlightened.
They have understood that the world is like a parental home; one has to go one day from here and hence all their doubts have been removed.
They are unattached amid hopes and remain charged with the knowledge.
They spread message of the Word in accordance with the conduct of the holy congregation.
The idea that they are servants of the servants of the Lord has got deeply rooted in the wisdom of the gurmukhs.
Be they anywhere in the country or abroad they remember God with every inhalation and exhalation of breath.
Technique of life - , ,
As in a boat per-chance many persons unknown to each other meet, likewise the creatures in the world meet each other.
The world is such as if ruling a kingdom and enjoying the pleasures in a dream.

gurmukhi: ਕਦੇ ਹਰਖੁ ਕਦੇ ਸੋਗੁ ਤਰਵਰ ਛਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Kaday Harakhu Kaday Sogu Taravar Chhaaiaa.
translation: Here happiness and sufferings are like shade of the tree.

gurmukhi: ਕਟੈ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਰੋਗੁ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Katai Haoumai Rogu N Aapu Ganaaiaa.
translation: Here in fact he has decimated the malady of ego who has not made himself to be noticed.

gurmukhi: ਘਰ ਹੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜੋਗੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Ghar Hee Andari Jogu Guramoukhi Paaiaa.
translation: Becoming gurmukh, individual even being at one's home attains union (with the Lord).
The Guru has made him understand that destiny cannot be averted (hence one without being worried should go on doing one's works).
Method in the world - desirelessness -
Gurmukhs have learnt the technique of life in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ਚੇਤਿ ਬਸੰਤੁ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਸਭ ਰੰਗ ਮਾਣਿਅਾ
transliteration: Chayti Basant Surangu Sabh Rang Maaniaa.
translation: They have consciously enjoyed the delight of the spring season of life.
They are elated like the water of rainy season (Savan) but still they (gurmukhs) have made water of hopes and desires go down and downward.

gurmukhi: ਸਜਣ ਮੇਲੁ ਸੁ ਢੰਗ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sajan Maylu Su Ddhang Choj Vidaaniaa.
translation: Meeting with such persons is wonderfully delightful.
They way of gurmukhs is devoid of mire and is accepted in the court of the Lord.
A meeting through the wisdom of the Guru is obstruction free, true and delightful.
Success of the birth

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਫਲ ਜਨੰਮੁ ਜਗ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Saphal Janamu Jagi Vichi Aaiaa.
translation: Blest is the birth of a gurmukh and his coming to this world.
In accordance with the wisdom of the Guru he deletes his ego and accomplishes the (virtuous) actions.

gurmukhi: ਭਾੳੁ ਭਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਕੰਮ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Bhaau Bhagati Kari Kanmu Soukh Phalu Paaiaa.
translation: He works controlled by his love for work and loving devotion, and receives the pleasure fruit (of life).
The inaccessible teachings of the Guru he adopts in his heart.
Keeping of the flag of forbearance and dharma high, becomes his innate nature.

gurmukhi: ਸਹੈ ਨ ਦੂਖ ਸਹੰਮੁ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Sahai N Dookh Sahanmu Bhaanaa Bhaaiaa ?10?
translation: He bows before the will of the Lord and never suffers any fear or sorrow.
Gurmukh-mind
Gurmukhs know (very well) that human birth is a rare opportunity.
That is why they cultivate love for holy congregation and enjoy all delights.
They speak after merging their consciousness in the Word.
They become bodiless while living in body and identify the truth.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਓਹੁ ਨ ੲੇਹੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਪਛਾਣਦੇ
transliteration: Doubidhaa Aohu N Ayhu Iku Pachhaanaday.
translation: They do not have this or that dilemma and know only one Lord.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਦਿਹਾੜੇ ਥੇਹੁ ਮਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਾਣਦੇ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Chaari Dihaarhay Dayhu Man Vichi Aanaday ?11?
translation: They know in their heart of heart that within a short period this world is going to become a mound (of earth) and hence they do not develop any attachment with it.
Reality of gurmukh
Rarely comes a benevolent gurmukh who serves others.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾੲਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paai Aapu Gavaaiaa.
translation: The Gurmukh abandons ego and receives the fruit of delight.
Only the gurmukh tells the story of the (grandeur of ) Word to the disciples (of the Guru) and never claims to tell something as his own.
Deeply pondering over the Word, a gurmukh practices truth in his life,

gurmukhi: ਸਚੁ ਰਿਦੈ ਮੁਹਿ ਸਚੁ ਸਚਿ ਸੁਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sachu Ridai Muhi Sachu Sachi Suhaaiaa.
translation: He likes the truth, which resides in his heart as well as speech.
Such a gurmukh not only spruces his own life he rather gets the whole world across.
Conduct of the gurmukh
The Gurmukh losing his ego and identifies his self.
The Gurmukh enters his innate nature through truth and contentment.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਧੀਰਜੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਦੲਿਅਾ ਸੁਖੁ ਮਾਣਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Dheeraju Dharamu Daiaa Soukhu Maaniaa.
translation: The Gurmukh alone enjoys the true delights of forbearance, dharma and compassion.
Gurmukhs very well understand the importance of the words first, and only then they speak them out.
Though being powerful, the gurmukhs always consider themselves weak and humble.
Because the gurmukhs are polite, they receive respects in the court of the Lord.
Gurmukhs always accept the divine order
Spending this life fruitfully gurmukh goes to the other world.

gurmukhi: ਸਚੀ ਦਰਗਹ ਜਾੲਿ ਸਚਾ ਪਿੜ ਮਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sachee Daragah Jaai Sachaa Pirhu Maliaa.
translation: There in the true court (of lord) he gets his true place.
Repast of gurmukh is love and his delight is devoid of flirtatiousness.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਚਿਤੁ ਨ ਹਲੈ ਹਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Nihachalu Chitu N Halai Haliaa.
translation: Gurmukh has a tranquil heart and remains steadfast even in ups and downs.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਚੁ ਅਲਾੳੁ ਭਲੀ ਹੂੰ ਭਲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Alaau Bhalee Hoon Bhaliaa.
translation: He speaks truth and good of the good.
Only gurmukhs are called to the court of the Lord and they come to the world only when the Lord sends them.
Virtue of a Gurmukh
Gurmukh accomplishes the intractable and hence is called sadhu.
Gurmukh has such wisdom, which is competent to separate water from milk. This is why he is called wise.
The devotion of gurmukh is loving devotion.
Since the gurmukhs attain divine knowledge, they are called knowledgeable ones (jnanis).
Gurmukhs have the wisdom fully stamped and marked by the Word.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੳੁੜੀ ਪਤਿ ਪਿਰਮੁ ਰਸੁ ਮਾਣੀਅੈ ||੧੫||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Paurhee Pati Piram Rasu Maaneeai ?15?
translation: Climbing the stairs of high regards, the gurmukh enjoys the delight of love of the beloved Lord.
Gains from a gurmukh
The true name of the creator Lord is received from the gurmukhs,
Amidst the gurmukhs the Oankar Word is remembered.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ਸਦਾ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sabadu Veechaaru Sadaa Liv Laaeeai.
translation: Amid the gurmukhs the word is pondered upon and the consciousness is merged in it,
Living the truthful life of the gurmukhs, the truth is accomplished in life.
Gurmukh is that door of liberation through which one automatically enters his innate nature (the divine self).
He base of name (of the Lord) is attained from gurmukhs and one does not repent in the end.
Gains from a gurmukh
Touching the philosopher's stone in the form of a gurmukh one himself becomes the philosophers stone.
By the glimpse only of the gurmukh, all evil passions become untouchable.
Meditating upon the Lord amid the gurmukhs one loses duality.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਧਨ ਰੂਪ ਨਿੰਦ ਨ ਗੋੲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Par Dhan Roop Nid N Goeeai.
translation: In the company of the gurmukhs neither the wealth and physical beauty of others is seen nor is backbiting committed.
In the company of gurmukhs only nectar-name in the form of Word is churned and the essence is acquired.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹਸਦਾ ਜਾੲਿ ਅੰਤ ਨ ਰੋੲੀਅੈ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Hasadaa Jaai Ant N Roeeai ?17?
translation: In the company of gurmukhs the jiva (self) at last becomes happy and does not wail and weep.
Nature and form of gurmukh
As a knowledgeable person, the gurmukh imparts knowledge to the world.
Losing their ego, the gurmukhs purify their inner-self.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਨ ਕਾਮੁ ਕਰੋਧੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Satu Santokhu N Kaamu Karodheeai.
translation: Gurmukhs adopt truth and contentment and do not indulge in lust and anger.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੈ ਨਿਰਵੈਰੁ ਨ ਵੈਰ ਵਿਰੋਧੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Hai Niravairu N Vair Virodheeai.
translation: Gurmukhs have no enmity and opposition towards anyone.
Preaching to all the four varnas, gurmukhs merge in equipoise.
Blest is the mother of a gurmukh who has given birth to him and the gurmukh is the best among warriors.
Carefree gurmukh
Gurmukh eulogises the wondrous Lord in the form.
Gurmukhs have true kingdom of God's praises.
Gurmukhs have armour of truth which they have been gifted by the Lord.
For gurmukhs only the beautiful highway of truth has been prepared.
Their wisdom is unfathomable and to get to it one gets perplexed.
Gurmukh is carefree in the world but not so towards the Lord.
Serious and tranquil gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਤੋਲੁ ਨ ਤੋਲਣਿ ਤੋਲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pooraa Tolu N Tolani Toleeai.
translation: Gurmukh is perfect; he cannot be weighed on any scale.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਬੋਲ ਨ ਬੋਲਣਿ ਬੋਲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pooraa Bolu N Bolani Boleeai.
translation: Every word by gurmukh comes to be true and perfect and nothing can be said about him.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਤਿ ਅਡੋਲ ਨ ਡੋਲਣਿ ਡੋਲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Mati Adol N Dolani Doleeai.
translation: The wisdom of gurmukhs is stable one and does not get destabilised even if done so.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਿਰਮ ਅਮੋਲੁ ਨ ਮੋਲਣਿ ਮੋਲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Piramu Amolu N Molani Moleeai.
translation: The love of gurmukhs is invaluable and it cannot be purchased at any cost.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥ ਨਿਰੋਲੁ ਨ ਰੋਲਣਿ ਰੋਲੀਅੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pandu Nirolu N Rolani Roleeai.
translation: The way of gurmukh is clear and distinct; it cannot be subsumed and dissipated by any one.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਅਲੋਲੁ ਪੀ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਝੋਲੀਅੈ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sabadu Alolu Pee Anmrit Jholeeai ?20?
translation: The words of gurmukhs are steadfast; along with them one quaffs nectar by deleting passions and carnal desires.
Gurmukhs remain dormant in their self

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਪਾੲਿ ਸਭ ਫਲ ਪਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Paai Sabh Phal Paaiaa.
translation: By attaining pleasure-fruit gurmukhs have received all the fruits.

gurmukhi: ਰੰਗੁ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਾੲਿ ਸਭ ਰੰਗ ਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Rang Surang Charhhaai Sabh Rang Laaiaa.
translation: Putting on the beautiful colour of the Lord they have enjoyed the delight of all the colours.
Merging in the fragrance (of devotion) they make everyone fragrant.

transliteration: Anmrit Ras Tripataai Sabh Ras Aaiaa.
translation: They have satiated with the delight of nectar and now they feel as if they have had all the taste.

transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Laai Anahad Vaaiaa.
translation: Merging their consciousness in the Word they have become one with the unstruck melody.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਜਾੲਿ ਨ ਦਹਦਿਸਿ ਧਾੲਿਅਾ ||੨੧||੧੯||
transliteration: Nij Ghari Nihachal Jaai Dah Dis Dhaaiaa ?21?19?ounee?
translation: Now they get stabilised in their inner self and their mind does not now wonder in all the ten directions.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਅਤਿ ਅਸਚਰਜ ਮੈ ਹੇਰਤ ਹਿਰਾਨੇ ਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਬਿਸਰਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Ati Asacharaj Mai , Hayrat Hiraanay Aan Dhiaan Bisaraanay Hai ?
translation: The contentment that a devout Sikh gets from meditating on His name is so mystical that he (Gursikh) forgets all other worldly pleasures.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਗੰਧ ਰਸ ਬਿਸਮ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਨ ਰਸ ਬਾਸਨਾ ਬਿਲਾਸ ਨ ਹਿਤਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Gandh Ras Bisam Hui , An Ras Baasanaa Bilaas N Hitaanay Hai ?
translation: With the fragrance of spiritual peace Guru-conscious person lives in a state of bliss and forgets all other worldly enjoyments.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਅਦਭੁਤ ਅਸਥਾਨ ਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਮੰਡਲ ਅਸਥਲ ਨ ਲੁਭਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Adabhout Asadaana , Mrit Mandal Asadal N Loubhaanay Hai ?
translation: Those who live in the conscious presence of True Guru live a state of perpetual bliss. The perishable pleasures of the destructible world entice and attract them no more

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਾਪ ਦੇਖ ਅਾਨ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਸਭ ਨਿਰਸ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਨੇ ਹੈ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Sangati Milaap Daykha , Aan Giaan Dhiaan Sabh Niras Kari Jaanay Hai ?19?
translation: In the company of spiritually elevated souls and seeing their state of ecstasy of uniting with the Lord, they consider all wisdom and attractions of the world as worthless. (19)
